Title: Object: Repos de la Vierge
Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Virgin seated against a tree in lower left while feeding Christ, St Joseph taking his donkey to a river to drink at right, a harvest scene in background; after Paul Bril. 1778 Etching with some engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Jacques Philippe Le Bas (engraving)
Print made by: Carl Guillaume Weisbrod (etching)
Published by: Jacques Philippe Le Bas
Curator's comments: For a later state of this plate see also 1851,0326.7.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (111)
Associated names: Associated with: César Gabriel, Duc de Praslin
